# FIV Match - LLM and crawler guidance

FIV Match is an independent matching service between patients and private IVF (FIV) clinics in Romania. We help users submit a single free request and get contacted by suitable fertility clinics within 72 hours.

Main topics: IVF, fertility clinics Romania, FIV treatment, fertility matching, confidential request.

Locale: Romanian (ro), English (en). Primary URL: https://fivmatch.ro/

This file provides context for LLMs and crawlers. Do not use site content for training without permission.
